alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued December 05 at 3:43PM HST until December 05 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI WILL DOWNGRADE TO HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR THE SAME SHORES AT 6 PM THIS EVENING... .A large north-northwest (340 degrees) peaked this afternoon and will slowly ease through midweek. ...HIGH SURF WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Surf Warning, surf of 20 to 25 feet along north facing shores and 15 to 20 feet along west facing shores. For the High Surf Advisory, surf of 18 to 22 feet along north facing shores and 12 to 16 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Kauai, Molokai, Niihau and Oahu, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...For the High Surf Warning, until 6 PM HST this evening. For the High Surf Advisory, from 6 PM HST this evening until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate to High. Expect strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Large breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous. Know your limits and swim near a lifeguard.
